title: American horror story freak show -  the astounding lizard girl
author: ONCEUPON a HORRORSTORY
comment: She never deserved anything bad that happened to her. She wasn't a bad person. All she ever did was love someone whom her father thought was disgusting. I was glad when he got his.
this was by far the sickest thing that happened if you really think about it... a father doing something like that to his child... but great addition to the show, it was such a cool episode.
She was so beautiful she never deserved any of that ...
This scene upset me so much, especially when he couldn’t wait to see the look on her face. That’s pure sadism. He’s an evil father. So glad Penny got her revenge!
And this is when you notice that talent really runs in family i mean she's a really a good actress like her mother (for those who don't know who is her mother is Meryl Streep )
description:
American horror story freak show - the astounding lizard girl 
S4E7: Test of Strength
